title.rendered: Karnataka vs Rajasthan, Indian First-Class Trophy 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Karnataka: Ravikumar Samarth, Mayank Agarwal (c), Vishal Onat, Nikin Jose , Manish Pandey, Sharath BR (wk), Krishnappa Gowtham, Shreyas Gopal, Vasuki Koushik, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Vidhwath Kaverappa

Rajasthan: Yash Kothari, Abhijeet Tomar, Mahipal Lomror, Salman Khan, Ashok Menaria (c), Shubham Sharma, Kunal Singh Rathore (wk), Rituraj Singh, Karan Lamba, Manav Suthar, Aniket Choudhary

Pitch Report

Venue: KSCA Cricket Ground, Alur

Type: Seam movement on the 1st day. Easier for batting as the game progresses.

Weather: Clear

Fantasy Tips of the Day

In 4 games, Ravikumar Samarth has scored 3 hundreds and a fifty. His Ultimate Team percentage reads 100 this season.

For Rajasthan, Deepak Hooda has scored the bulk of the runs. He has accumulated 383 runs, including 2 hundreds and a fifty in 3 outings. He can also roll his arm over in the time of need. He has taken 3 wickets with his part-time off-spin.    

The experienced duo of Manish Pandey and Mayank Agarwal has been playing well in tandem. While Pandey has a double-hundred to his name, Agarwal has scored either a fifty or hundred in every game.

Vijaykumar Vyshak and Vidhwath Kaverappa will enjoy bowling on this pitch. Between them, they have managed as many as 34 wickets. On the other hand,

Manav Suthar has taken the bulk of the wickets for Rajasthan.

In the wicketkeeper category, BS Sharath is ahead of Kunal Rathore. Sharath has pouched as many as 18 catches compared to Rathore’s 12.
